author: AP, AP
title: Boxer Has License Suspended After Posting Video on How to Hit Women During Virus Lockdown
description: CARDIFF, Wales (AP) — British boxer Billy Joe Saunders had his boxing license suspended Monday after publishing a social media video in which he appeared to condone domestic violence amid the coronavirus outbreak.
content:
CARDIFF, Wales (AP) British boxer Billy Joe Saunders had his boxing license suspended Monday after publishing a social media video in which he appeared to condone domestic violence amid the coronavirus outbreak.
